Comment: The people who immediately feel the sting are all the socially upward moving people in society. This Republican tax bill just raises the debt by 1.5 trillion dollars and does nothing for average people.

Maybe $500k mortgage interest deduction does not impact a lot of people now. But lets look at reality. The AMT tax impacted very few people when it was introduced. But it now impacts much of the middle class due to inflation. So don't believe the lies that this corrupt Congress is pushing. Most of the middle class will be paying a lot higher taxes in eight years if this lame bill passes.

And that higher standard deduction is a joke for families. You pay more in taxes as soon as you have three or more children because the Republicans take away the deduction for dependents.

The Democrats are stupid and Republicans are stupid as well. The reason why China may be leading the world in another decade is because our government cannot get its act together.

Comment: Hillary Clinton was the most corrupt candidate to ever run for the office of President. Women activists made a big mistake in throwing their support behind her. 

As for the demonstration, it was your typical vague, feel-goody demo that passes for activism these days. Bereft of focus, it was just a grab-bag of complaints, much of which was unfair or out of context. Women in the West, for example, have the most freedoms and rights as of anywhere in the world. Yet, no attempt was made to protest true abuses of women these days, primarily taking place in the Islamic sphere. No mention of the sex slavery, or the brutal mass murder happening across the Middle East and Africa. 

Instead, protestors carried signs equating wearing hijabs and burkhas with feminism. Foolish or willing fools? Who knows but it certainly is not feminism.

Comment: No: you inflated sense of yourself not withstanding, you didn't force me to do anything -- any more than I forced you to describe Trump as an a-hole. But you have caused me to change my mind about your claim that you are a lawyer. I think you probably are a lawyer. For you, winning an argument seems more important than telling the truth. For you, threading the needle between "liar" and "bullsh*tter" is more important than acknowledging that Trump's tweet was reckless and irresponsible; that he accused without supporting facts or evidence; that not caring whether something is true is the moral and functional equivalent of lying; that Trump has lied repeatedly in the weeks following the tweet.  You say that you think he's an a-hole; but that's easy and has no content. do you recognize him as reckless and incompetent? Or are you using a-hole as your shorthand for reckless, incompetent and dangerous?
A drunk clinging to his empty gin bottle: Agree?

Comment: You mean the $40K plus 40% benefits load Admin Clerk whose high school diploma would get her $20K and no benefits in the private sector, that Admin Clerk?   This really isn't the kind of comparison you want to make, because the State pays far above market in lower/entry level jobs.

And those "rubes" you're talking about are your boss.   You're a poster child for why it is so easy to hate public employees.    Most of them are just ordinary people who go to work and do what they're told, but there is a fairly large contingent who are arrogant malcontents and they get away with it in union-friendly administrations because supervisors don't dare supervise.   In less union-friendly times we got the pleasure of firing some of them.

Comment: The League of Women Voters was born of a legitimate desire to make the political process more inclusive to women. That role has been fulfilled to a great degree as women vote and hold positions in school boards and city councils, state legislatures and executive offices, and Congress. No president or vice president yet, and no president certainly at least until 2016, but that is hardly a reflection on the broader inclusion of women.

Now the LWV is a bunch of partisan hacks, using the organization’s virtuous tradition as a front for pushing a leftist agenda. Supporting gun controls, the Affordable Care Act, and the Clean Air Act have nothing to do with including women in the political process and informing them about issues and candidates, nor does abolishing the death penalty or opposing school vouchers, welfare reform, or the Keystone Pipeline. The LWV strongly supports abortion rights even though the victims of abortion are likely about 50% female. So much for their right to vote.

Comment: " ..putting money into the preservation of native languages would be a concrete gesture that could produce equally concrete benefits..."

Well - the money would be appreciated and spent by the language police - but guaranteed without any permanent benefit to the FN - merely preserving isolation and hopeless life style of frustration.

Being multilingual and having been around the globe more often than I wish to count - my experience:
- English is the language of busines, technology, logistics, documentation .... No matter whether you are in China, Japan, Europe .....
- Translation beyond the superficial - involving deep cultural context - is tricky, very expensive and of limited availability. Technical translation is not possible for languages that have not evolved in terms of the Industrial; Revolution and its consequences.
- For any language group to survive requires a critical mass of speakers and their economic independence. My guess would be a minimum of 100 Million + population.

Comment: Why does this author think she can demand, or is owed anything from either of these two people? One guy is a goon, the other is illiterate. They aren't law makers, teachers, or in any kind moral authority position. They are entertainers who get punched for her pleasure, and will likely live out their days mentally debilitated from the repeated blows to the head.

Do we get to comb deeply through this authors personal history and determine all the groups she owes apologies or explanations to? Why not? As an opinion maker in a national news paper and instructor of young people, she has far, far more influence on Canadians than two ignorant punchies.

The arrogance of these pseudo-intellectual academics is astounding. Since they are so enlightened and pure, YOU owe THEM an explanation and an apology as to why you're so dumb and ignorant.

The driver in this instance deserves sympathy; the bicyclist....

Your idiots who can't push a little button.....the same as the bicyclist.
